      • addCreditCardToCustomer

        public int addCreditCardToCustomer(CreditCardIf card,
                          CreditCardOptionsIf options)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Inserts a CreditCard object into the database. The object must be associated with an existing customer through the customer id attribute. If the address id attribute contains an id of an address object, that address must belong to the customer defined by customer id.
        Specified by:
        addCreditCardToCustomer in interface CustomerMgrIf
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        card - A Credit Card object
        options - Options not currently used
        Returns:
        Returns the id of the inserted object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                          CreditCardIf card,
                          CreditCardOptionsIf options)
                            throws java.lang.Exception

      • getAddressesPerVendor

        public Address[] getAddressesPerVendor(VendorIf vendor)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns all of the addresses registered for the given vendor.
        Specified by:
        getAddressesPerVendor in interface CustomerMgrIf
        Overrides:
        getAddressesPerVendor in class CustomerMgr
        Parameters:
        vendor -
        Returns:
        An array of address objects where the first one is the primary address. The other addresses are ordered by descending ADDRESS_BOOK_ID. Returns an empty array if no addresses exist.

        java.lang.Exception
